attributes.action: authorise a comments section for people signing these e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have noticed that a lot of people make comments about the petition, that they are signing, after entering their name or sometimes instead of it. In fact I have sometimes made a comment after entering my name. I have noticed that another e-petition website has a comments section for people signing their petitions.
As I mentioned, some people make a comment without showing their names on this website. Perhaps it should be a requirement for people to give their names, then if they wish they could make a comment in the appropriate section.

rejection.details: We will treat this as feedback.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
